channel.title: Deploy GCR Recommender System on Recommender System Solution
channel.description: Recent content in Deploy GCR Recommender System on Recommender System Solution

item.title: Prepare deploy scripts
item.description: In this section, you’ll need to prepare deploy script Open the Cloud9 IDE created in prerequisite section and go to /home/ec2-user/environment directory cd /home/ec2-user/environment Download scripts from our public github repo git clone https://github.com/gcr-solutions/recommender-system-solution.git cd recommender-system-solution/

item.title: Deploy The Offline Logic
item.description: In this step, you will deploy Recommender System Offline cd /home/ec2-user/environment/recommender-system-solution/scripts ./create-offline.sh This will take about 10 minutes to provision, For saving your time, you can go to Create Infrastructure section to create online infrastructure in a new cloud9 terminal. When deployment completed, you will see below screen:
